answers.answer: So they arent gonna do anything till next week? Do you know what your BP was? Because you are 37 weeks, if you were to deliver early there is less risk for complications as baby is developed and most likely wouldnt need too much assistance this far along... it is something that you want to keep an eye on just to be on the safe side but im assuming your BP wasnt too crazy high as they didnt admit you... when do you go back to the Dr??
I go back next Friday and im not sure how high my blood pressure was
They have to induce u if ur having High BP that's what they did to me with my first pregnancy..

question: So today im 37 weeks i went for my werkly checkup the doctor found protein in my urine n my blood pressure was high she told me im at risk for having preeclampsia i get my bloodwork back next week i just wanted to kno if anyone else deal with this and should i really worry about it
title: PREECLAMPSIA???
